John, the prisoner, to the risen seed of immortal love, most endeared salutation, &c. J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?
8 p.
Printed for Thomas Simmons ..., London : 1660.
Caption title. Signed at end: Rome, Bedlam, 8, 11 m., 1660, John. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
